Summary: saucer-like disk with triagular windows that chang
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Belpre
There were no other sightings in Belpre on or around May 4th 2002
divs: Sighting Detailsat our house making coffee. saw a red thing, it turned blue and then i ran andgot the binoculars. we thought the chemical place had blown up. my mom was verycalm and so was i. it turned yellow, then white, then green. it spun clockwiseand sometimes hovered. the whole time staying next to the radio tower. it wasblinking and spinning. it had triagular windows that were green and flourescent.there were about 9 windows. we watched it for about 1 hour and a half. then westopped watching it cause our legs were falling asleep.
